title: How To Choose the Right Vector Database as the Foundation of Your AI Stack
excerpt: Explore the practical trade-offs behind vector database selection from local prototyping with FAISS and Chroma to scaling with self-hosted or fully managed cloud options like Qdrant and Pinecone. This post breaks down the landscape by maturity level, helping AI builders pick the right tool for their stage without the hype, just real-world insights from building a GenAI-powered HR platform.
